item.title: Consistently Save Plots
item.description: Answers originally suggested by Jamie Hudson, Data Scientist and Jack Penzer, Senior Data Scientist The Problem It is important to be able to export/save the figures created in R in a consistent manner, so that throughout a deck all plots of a similar type (e.g.Â all bigrams) are the same size and resolution. If plots are saved using the Plots panel by clicking Export and Save as image, it is very easy to accidentally save plots as different sizes (and you cannot alter the resolution from the default value).
